title: Richard “Dick” David Waller
description: It is with overwhelming sadness that we announce the death of Richard Waller, loving father, grandfather, great-grandfather, uncle, and friend, at the age of 88, so soon after the passing of our wonderful mom, his beautiful wife Marilyn, five months prior. title: Jane Marie Solaro
description: Jane passed away peacefully on January 4, 2026 at the age of 91. Jane was born in Pacific Grove, CA on December 14, 1934 and lived in San Pedro her entire life. She is preceded in death by her loving husband John Solaro and her parents Matthew Bodul & Ann (Berkovich) Bodul. Jane enjoyed the [...]

title: Michael Eggleston
description: Michael Dennis (Mike) Eggleston, aged 77, passed away at his home on November 26th, 2025. Born in Chico to Floyd and Joy Eggleston on December 15th, 1947, Michael is survived by his wife of 57 years, Carol Eggleston (Hopper), his three daughters, Michelle Seipert, Becky Johnson and Mandi Atkinson, his grandchildren, Luke and Miranda Seipert, [...]

title: Donald Drowty
description: Donald Drowty, remembered both for his music and his lifelong commitment to helping others, passed away at the age of 87 on December 28, 2025, leaving a legacy of creativity, compassion, and service. Don was best known as a member of Dante and the Evergreens, the early rock-and-roll group that helped define the West Coast [...]

title: John Michael Wichman
description: John Michael Wichman, known fondly as Moke, 75, was born in Seattle, Washington, on April 15, 1950. John went on his heavenly drive on December 28th, 2025, in Chico, California. title: Daniel Arthur Perry
description: Daniel Arthur Perry, born July 29, 1960, in Willows, California, passed away while enjoying one of his favorite pastimesriding his motorcycle. He leaves behind a legacy of a life well lived. Dan was the beloved son of John and Jessie Perry and a brother to Linda and Larry, Nancy and Jeffrey, John and Patricia, and [...]

title: Shane Edwin Simpson
description: Shane passed away quietly at home at the age of 45. He leaves behind his mother Bobbie Rhea, his wife Natalie (Moreno) Simpson, and several cousins and friends. Shane had a big heart and always greeted his community with joy and humor, and will be missed deeply by all.

title: Doris A. Graves MD
description: Doris A. Graves MD, a pediatrician, died Jan. 6, 2026, in Alhambra, after a short illness. She was 91.She was born July 14, 1934, in Los Angeles. title: John Hall
description: John was born October 7, 1933 in Chico, California to John and Alice Hall. He was raised on the family ranch in Cana and then served in the United States Army.
